actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the special deduction for the living expenses of Members of Congress.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code, with respect to the deduction of trade or business expenses, to repeal the special provisions regarding the place of residence and living expenses of Members of Congress.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the special deduction for the living expenses of Members of Congress.
